About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I'm a software engineer with focus on data specializing in Python, Java, and Cloud technologies. I excel in software development and it's lifecycle, constantly seeking to enhance my skills. My background includes a Bachelor's and Master's in Computer Science, reflecting my commitment to growth in the tech sector.

RSM

Data Engineer

I lead the orchestration of Docker-based AI applications using Kubernetes, and deploy microservices on AWS with Terraform. I develop Python scripts to automate the deployment and management processes using Jenkins(CI/CD).

Chingu

Software Engineer

As a lead backend developer, I specialized in developing RESTful APIs for user models using the Django/Python stack and deploying these to AWS.

TDI

Data Scientist Fellow

I developed a ML model for prediction, classification and accuracy using Python and scikit-learn. My expertise lied in data cleaning, feature engineering, and analysis, utilizing tools like SQL, TensorFlow, Tableau, Matplotlib, and Seaborn.
